subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Bulls, who finished 11th in the Eastern Conference, fired their interim coach Jim Boylan. The Bulls, who won 49 games and reached the second round of the playoffs last season, were 33-49 this season. They were 24-32 with Boylan, who was promoted after Scott Skiles was fired in December.
